title: Dry Bones

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Bodyblock**: Protect your Target, Redirecting all visits on them to you.
- **Bone Throw** (3x): Astrally hit a target's head really hard with one of your loose bones, they recieve no feedback tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you die, you will automatically be revived on the start of second night after you die, cannot activate if there are no other Koopas alive.
- You cannot vote after your first death, unless you are the last Koopa alive.
- You can use **Bone Throw** multiples times each night, as long as you have the ammo to do so.

desc:
Post 1447
*A skeleton Koopa that sometimes builds friends. Even after it collapses, it will sometimes get back up.*
